FuncDef: This command configures the interface type to be one of broadcast, point-to-point, or non-broadcast.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the interface as a broadcast network. To significantly improve adjacency forming and network convergence, configure a network as point-to-point if only two routers are connected, even if the network is a broadcast media such as Ethernet.
Configures the interface as a point-to-point link.
Configures the interface as a non-broadcast network.

ExtraInfo: Default: interface-type point-to-point  (if the physical interface is SONET)interface-type broadcast  (if the physical interface is Ethernet or unknown)
